com.marklogic.junit

Class ClientTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.Assert
      • com.marklogic.junit.XmlHelper
        • com.marklogic.junit.BaseTestHelper
          • com.marklogic.junit.ClientTestHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TestHelper

    public class ClientTestHelper
extends BaseTestHelper
    Intended to provide some common assertion methods that depend on calls to MarkLogic via the MarkLogic Java API - i.e. the DatabaseClient, which is abbreviated as "Client".
